title: No, the lockdown has not been extended till 03 June 2020 in Telangana.
subtitle: No, the lockdown has not been extended till 3 June 2020 in Telangana. While CM KCR has expressed his wish to extend the lockdown and made an appeal to PM, no such extension has been announced. CM KCR himself has debunked the claim in his press conference.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A piece of news has been published by some news agencies that CM KCR has announced the extension of lockdown in the Telangana State till 03 June 2020. FACTLY has found that no such announcement has been made by CM KCR. The Chief Minister himself has responded to the news in his press conference and has debunked the fake news.

Did you watch our new video?
